pkgmetadata.longdescription: GTKWave is a fully featured GTK+ based wave viewer for Unix and Win32 which reads LXT, LXT2, VZT, and GHW files as well as standard Verilog VCD/EVCD files and allows their viewing.

use.flag: Enables experimental Fast SST Tree widget code.
Renders lines as double width in gtkwave.
Enables '#pragma pack' for data arrays (saves memory, costs time).
